text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
choice_data_list: Oh, Rice! I didn't know you were already here.
Oh, Rice! I didn't know you were already here.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: B-Big Br—I mean, Trainer! H-hello.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: B-Big Si—I mean, Trainer! H-hello.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
A picture book. It's my favorite, "The<n>Blue Rose of Good
Fortune."

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
It's set in a rose garden. A garden<n>filled with roses of all
kinds of colors,<n>which people loved to go and see.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
But one day, a new rose buds in the<n>garden, with a deep
blue hue that<n>nobody has ever seen before.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
All the other flowers and visitors to<n>the garden looked down
on the blue<n>rose, calling it "creepy" or a "bad<n>omen."

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
After a while, the blue rose thinks to<n>itself, "They're right.
I'm a failure of a<n>flower," and starts to wilt.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Oh, b-but, the story doesn't end there,<n>okay? Because one
day, Big Brother<n>appears before the drooping blue<n>rose.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Oh, b-but, the story doesn't end there,<n>okay? Because one
day, Big Sister<n>appears before the drooping blue<n>rose.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
That's right—a really kind person with<n>a gentle smile! And
when this new<n>visitor saw the blue rosebud, they<n>said...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
"Why, this blue rose is simply<n>magnificent! I can't wait to
see it<n>blossom. Please let me purchase this<n>rose!"

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
"Why, this blue rose is simply<n>magnificent! I can't wait to
see it<n>blossom. Please let me purchase this<n>rose!"

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
After that, Big Brother replanted the<n>blue rose in a flowerpot,
and he talked<n>to it every day until it bloomed into a<n>lovely
flower.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
After that, Big Sister replanted the<n>blue rose in a flowerpot,
and she<n>talked to it every day until it bloomed<n>into a lovely
flower.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The blue rose decorated his<n>windowsill, where it brought
good<n>fortune to anyone who would pass<n>by.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The blue rose decorated her<n>windowsill, where it brought
good<n>fortune to anyone who would pass<n>by.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...Y-you think so too, Trainer?! Hehe,<n>that makes me happy!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I read this book for the first time<n>when I was little. And it
made me<n>think—maybe even I can become like<n>the blue
rose.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Instead of staying a useless girl of<n>misfortune... I could grow
into a blue<n>rose of good fortune.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Around the same time... Mother took<n>me to go see a race.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
There were so many people at the<n>racecourse... I kept
worrying about<n>how I didn't want to cause trouble for<n>
anyone, and it made my head spin.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
But you know, there's one thing I<n>clearly remember!
Everyone watching<n>the race had big smiles on their faces.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
And when their favorite won the<n>race... they all looked so
happy.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
That's why I... I thought I'd love to be<n>like that too
someday.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
From a nuisance who brings<n>misfortune upon others... to a
runner<n>who can make everyone smile.
choice_data_list: If anyone can do it, it's you, Rice.
If anyone can do it, it's you, Rice.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hehe... Yeah, you're right! I'm going<n>to train my hardest!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Since then, Rice has kept on training<n>as hard as she can.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And finally, the time has come!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer, you said you had big news?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: M-my debut!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: So it's finally time for me to race...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah, um!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I-I'll be fine. I won't repeat what<n>happened at the tryouts...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, you're with me this time... So<n>I'll give it my all!
C'mon, Rice... You<n>can do this—yeah!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Oh, um... That's a little mantra that<n>Mother taught me. She
said it would<n>pump me up and get me motivated.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer, do you want to try too?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: W-wait, me too! Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hehe... Hehehe!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We immediately return to training—this<n>time with Rice's
debut race in mind.<n>The preparations go swimmingly, and<n>
Rice's morale is at an all-time high.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: ...Or so I thought.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The morning of the debut race...

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Ah, there you are! Hey hey, you're<n>Rice's trainer, right?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: All righty, to the Miho Dormitory we<n>go!
choice_data_list: Wait a second, what's going on?!
Wait a second, what's going on?!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Uh, you see, Rice has been playing<n>hide-and-seek with
everyone at the<n>dorm since this morning!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Hishiama, Bakushin O—everyone's<n>out looking for her! It
looked fun, so I<n>decided to play too!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
I peeked into one of the empty corner<n>rooms, and Rice was
actually in there,<n>but the thing is...

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: She was mumbling, "Trainer..." in a<n>real teensy voice!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
So I thought maybe Rice wants her<n>trainer to find her, and
nobody else.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: C'mon, let's go already! Just follow<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Urara! Didja find Rice—What the?!<n>Why'd you bring her
trainer here?!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Don't tell me you're planning on<n>bringing them inside. You
know that<n>trainers aren't allowed inside student<n>dorms!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Huh?! My bad! But Rice wanted them<n>to come...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Augh, fine! I'll let ya off this onetime! Dorm mom is givin' yapermission, so scurry off, wouldja!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Okay! Thanks a bunch, Hishiama!<n>Trainer, over here!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Ummm. Knock knock knock, Riiice!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: U-Urara... how did you know I was<n>here?!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Well you see, you were calling for<n>your trainer, so I brought
them here!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: T-Trainer!
